author: Tony Tobin
method: Heat the oil in a small pan and place the grated carrot into the pan along with the sugar and vinegar. Cook over a low heat for 6-8 minutes, then set aside and leave to cool slightly. Place the carrot mixture into a tall glass. Sprinkle over the breadcrumbs, then pour over the wine. Place the yoghurt and Stilton into a bowl, mix well and spoon over the soaked breadcrumbs. Place the 'trifle' into the fridge to chill until needed.
ingredients: 1 tbsp vegetable oil,  ½ carrot, blanched and grated,  2 tbsp caster sugar,  1 tbsp white wine vinegar,  25g/1oz fresh breadcrumbs,  3 tbsp white wine,  75ml/2½fl oz Greek-style yoghurt,  30g/1oz Stilton, crumbled
